title: WaitAny polling causes excessive store I/O
description:
## Location
- internal/orchestrator/orchestrator.go:1025-1070

## Problem
Polls every 250ms with GetSpawn calls for all pending spawns. Each call reads from the file-based store with flock. Under high spawn counts this creates unnecessary disk I/O and lock contention.

## Fix
Use channel-based notification from onSpawnComplete instead of polling the store.
